title: ** Basic Authentication
preconditions: User is on the Basic Auth webpage (<https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/basic_auth>)
User has the required credentials: username = admin, password = admin
main_flow: User enters the URL <https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/basic_auth> into the web browser address bar.
The browser loads the Basic Auth webpage.
User locates and enters the value "admin" into the Username field.
4. User locates and enters the value "admin" into the Password field.
5. User clicks the Sign in button.
6. The system verifies the entered credentials.
7. If credentials are correct, the system displays the two headers: "Basic Auth" and "Congratulations! You must have the proper credentials."
If the Username or Password is incorrect, the system displays an error message and the user is prompted to enter the correct credentials.
postconditions: The user is logged in and sees the two headers: "Basic Auth" and "Congratulations! You must have the proper credentials."
The user can now access the protected content on the Basic Auth webpage.
